Summary *Practiced IT professional with true enterprise experience (i.e. administrator of mainframe, server, and desktop systems) 
 
*Proficient technical author (e.g. proposal development, white papers, customized training curriculum, process documentation) 
 
*Seasoned customer interface (e.g. task order performance, briefings, marketing calls, technical demonstrations) 
 
*More than just a “techie” – can identify a customer need, design a creative solution to meet complex requirements, author a winning proposal, plan and perform hands-on implementation, and prepare the new environment for continuous improvement.

Summary I am a Product Strategist for Google Apps for Work & Education focusing on Security, Privacy, and Legal Compliance. In this role I work with the greater Security and Compliance Teams at Google, I have authored platform white papers, and present at international industry conferences.  
 
Previously, I was an Amsterdam based Sales Engineering Manager for Google Enterprise specializing in Google Apps for Enterprise, Google Message Security, and Chrome OS, in addition to serving as Security and Compliance Lead for EMEA.  
 
I have extensive experience as a Program Manager / Integration Project Manager -- with twelve years of experience in supporting product development, designing and implementing integration solutions on national and international engagements. As a Program Manager at Microsoft, I have worked directly with Customers to validate product features and requirements and successfully related these findings to software development teams. As an Integration Project Manager at Accenture, I have played several instrumental roles including Account Management, Business Analyst (Business Process Definition, Functional Requirements Gathering), Solution Architect, Solution Engineer and Team Lead for cross-platform business integration solutions. I have led integration teams across multiple geographies with a strong track record of delivering solutions on time and on budget. 
I am a well rounded technologist with a focus on middleware technologies (BizTalk, webMethods, and Vitria) with implementation experience spanning all phases of the software development lifecycle. I have deep industry experience in cellular telecommunications, pharmaceutical, and the financial services industries. I possess strong analytical skills, am detail oriented, and quickly learn new technologies.

Summary Collaborative management style that focuses on delighting the customer to build long term product line revenue and competitive advantage. Ability to prioritize within a spending envelope, lead or contribute to team development, and build credibility with thought leaders and partners. Experience in leading teams with and without direct authority. Passion for coaching and developing talented individuals achieve their career goals. 
 
Blue chip product management and business development experience in several market segments: IaaS, PaaS, enterprise productivity apps, application & WAN acceleration, enterprise networking (switch/route/wireless), and UX.  
 
Expertise in enterprise and partner go to market (GTM) including sales enablement & training, product marketing programs, customer references, vertical strategies, and channels. 
 
Strong experience in user centered design (UCD), human centered design (HCD) and traditional primary market research. Expertise in prioritizing product roadmaps from 1-N making painful tradeoffs in both run rate and emerging markets. 
 
Ability and willingness to break through red tape to get the job done using an entrepreneurial spirit. Demonstrated passion for the voice of the customer and elimination of customer pain.  
 
Closed partnership deals with projected revenue in the $B range. Integrative negotiator highly focused on aligned incentives and durable deals. Experience Platform Product Strategist - Google Apps for Work Google April 2015  – Present (5 months) Mountain View, CA Product Management and Business Development for Google for Work. I help Google and ISV partners build magical integrations. Responsible for identifying partners, defining ideal integrations, providing technical and UX guidance, and providing GTM support for ISVs. Prioritize and develop business case for API and extensibility features across the Google for Work suite: Gmail, Drive, Sheets, Slides, Docs, Search, Google+, Calendar, Hangouts, Vault, and Sites. Sr. Manager, Product Management & Business Development - Amazon WorkDocs Amazon Web Services July 2014  –  April 2015  (10 months) Palo Alto, CA AWS is the world leader in cloud computing. As customers ask us to move more of their business's workloads to the cloud we develop exciting applications that take advantage of AWS's infrastructure and platform offerings. Amazon WorkDocs is one such application. Amazon WorkDocs is a rapidly growing fully managed enterprise file sync and share (EFSS) platform and application that runs on AWS services. WorkDocs allows enterprise users to securely store files in the cloud, collaborate with each other, and share with users inside and outside of the company. Documents can be accessed via any device, anywhere, securely over the internet. 
 
Responsible for product roadmap, product strategy and planning, adjacencies, partner management, go to market, pricing, and sales enablement with particular focus on the enterprise marketplace.  
 
Expanded product management team to increase quality and velocity. 
Developed platform strategy and pricing for strategic customers. 
Source, qualify and manage partnerships and corporate development/strategic options. 
Built vertical strategy around healthcare, retail, financial services and federal accounts. 
Responsible for global GTM strategy and management of execution team. 
Contributed to integration between WorkDocs and WorkMail, the AWS email service. Sr. Product and Business Development Manager Cisco August 2013  –  July 2014  (1 year) San Jose, CA Responsible for business development and product management for Akamai Connect WAN optimization partnership from incubation to productization.  
 
Built pipeline resulting in multi million dollar first quarter revenue. Wins at major retailers like Louis Vuitton, Bose and Target. 
 
Akamai Connect delivers the ability to leverage the internet as a business critical application delivery option and an alternative to MPLS. 
 
Akamai connect integrates optimization and acceleration technologies from Cisco and Akamai into the branch router, potentially reaching up to 85% of the world's branch offices. The solution includes: 
 
-Application visibility and routing 
-Application based Quality of Service 
-WAN Acceleration and Optimization 
-Transparent Caching for internet traffic 
-Connected Caching for content delivered by the Akamai Intelligent Platform 
-Content pre-positioning
